name: Tüç Game
description:
Casual card game where the player tries to achieve the highest score using cards and score combinations. When you understand the gameplay, it's a great time-killer.

You might have trouble playing at first; just try to spell the game's name. It's difficult, right? So there is a tutorial to help, and it's recommended to understand how the game works.

There are also different game modes, which added to the testing of some concepts. If you're interested in some of my game development ideas, I recommend reading the devlog.

No sound or music? Do not worry, game do not have any
